      • getScale

        public double getScale(double minX,
                       double maxX,
                       double width,
                       double dpi)
        Description copied from interface: IProjection
        First two parameters must be in meters. This should be changed (map units should be used) and then change the places where this method is used.
        Parameters:
        minX - in meters
        maxX - in meters
        width - in pixels (dots)
        dpi - dots per inch
        Returns:
        Scale denominator ( the "X" in "1 : X" )
